description: Current System Security Plan (SSP) document with all required sections completed, including system information, authorization boundary, network diagrams, and control implementation details
Most recent control assessment report from an accredited Third Party Assessment Organization (3PAO) documenting the results of annual security control testing
Current Plan of Action and Milestones (POA&M) document showing all open security weaknesses, remediation plans, and monthly updates
Continuous Monitoring Strategy and Plan documenting the approach, frequency, and responsibilities for ongoing security monitoring activities
Most recent penetration test report conducted by an independent testing team, including findings, risk ratings, and remediation status
Vulnerability scan reports from the past 12 months showing monthly scanning of operating systems, databases, web applications, containers, and services
Current Interconnection Security Agreements (ISAs) or Memoranda of Understanding (MOUs) for all external system connections and data exchanges
Inventory of internal system connections including all authorized components, interface characteristics, and security requirements
Assessment, authorization, and monitoring policy and procedures documentation, including most recent review and approval dates
Evidence of independent assessor qualifications and accreditation status (3PAO accreditation documentation)
Continuous monitoring reports and dashboards provided to the JAB or Authorizing Official showing security and privacy status
Authorization to Operate (ATO) letter or memorandum from the Authorizing Official, including any conditions or limitations
Documentation of specialized security assessments conducted, including announced vulnerability scanning, malicious user testing, or insider threat assessments
Evidence of annual review and updates to all interconnection agreements and internal connection authorizations
Risk monitoring documentation showing effectiveness monitoring, compliance monitoring, and change monitoring activities
